resources.string: Create an alarm by simply clicking on this button and setting when it should go off.
Choose the time you want your alarm to disable the selected connections.

If you want your alarm to re-enable your connections after it had disabled them, simply select when you want that to happen. If however you want your alarm to only disable connections, deactivate this option.
Choose the connections you want your alarm to handle disabling and re-enabling. You can choose among 3 options: Wifi, Hotspot and Bluetooth.
Choose how frequently you want your alarm to go off by simply selecting the days of the week your alarm should be scheduled on.
